title: LET US BREAK BREAD TOGETHER AT THE ALTAR
author: Traditional African-American spiritual (19th-century origin)

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Let us break bread together on our knees,
Let us break bread together on our knees,
When I fall down on my knees with my face to the rising sun,
O Lord have mercy on me.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Let us drink wine together on our knees,
Let us drink wine together on our knees,
When I fall down on my knees with my face to the rising sun,
O Lord have mercy on me.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Let us praise God together on our knees,
Let us praise God together on our knees,
When I fall down on my knees with my face to the rising sun,
O Lord have mercy on me.
